verses.verse: מִ֭שְׁלֵי <S%H4912><s%> The proverbs שְׁלֹמֹ֣ה <S%H8010><s%> of Solomon בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son דָּוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> of David מֶ֝֗לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

לָדַ֣עַת <S%H3045><s%> To know חָכְמָ֣ה <S%H2451><s%> wisdom וּמוּסָ֑ר <S%H4148><s%> and instruction לְ֝הָבִ֗ין <S%H995><s%> to perceive אִמְרֵ֥י <S%H561><s%> the words בִינָֽה׃ <S%H998><s%> of understanding

לָ֭קַחַת <S%H3947><s%> To receive מוּסַ֣ר <S%H4148><s%> the instruction הַשְׂכֵּ֑ל <S%H7919><s%> of wisdom צֶ֥דֶק <S%H6664><s%> justice וּ֝מִשְׁפָּ֗ט <S%H4941><s%> and judgment וּמֵישָׁרִֽים׃ <S%H4339><s%> and equity

לָתֵ֣ת <S%H5414><s%> To give לִפְתָאיִ֣ם <S%H6612><s%> to the simple עָרְמָ֑ה <S%H6195><s%> subtilty לְ֝נַ֗עַר <S%H5288><s%> to the young man דַּ֣עַת <S%H1847><s%> knowledge וּמְזִמָּֽה׃ <S%H4209><s%> and discretion

יִשְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> [man] will hear חָ֭כָם <S%H2450><s%> A wise וְי֣וֹסֶף <S%H3254><s%> and will increase לֶ֑קַח <S%H3948><s%> learning וְ֝נָב֗וֹן <S%H995><s%> and a man of understanding תַּחְבֻּל֥וֹת <S%H8458><s%> unto wise counsels יִקְנֶֽה׃ <S%H7069><s%> shall attain

לְהָבִ֣ין <S%H995><s%> To understand מָ֭שָׁל <S%H4912><s%> a proverb וּמְלִיצָ֑ה <S%H4426><s%> and the interpretation דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> the words חֲ֝כָמִ֗ים <S%H2450><s%> of the wise וְחִידֹתָֽם׃ <S%H2420><s%> and their dark sayings

יִרְאַ֣ת <S%H3374><s%> The fear יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD רֵאשִׁ֣ית <S%H7225><s%> [is] the beginning דָּ֑עַת <S%H1847><s%> of knowledge חָכְמָ֥ה <S%H2451><s%> wisdom וּ֝מוּסָ֗ר <S%H4148><s%> and instruction אֱוִילִ֥ים <S%H191><s%> [but] fools בָּֽזוּ׃ <S%H936><s%> despise פ

שְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> hear בְּ֭נִי <S%H1121><s%> My son מוּסַ֣ר <S%H4148><s%> the instruction אָבִ֑יךָ <S%H1><s%> of thy father וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּ֝טֹּ֗שׁ <S%H5203><s%> and forsake תּוֹרַ֥ת <S%H8451><s%> not the law אִמֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H517><s%> of thy mother

כִּ֤י ׀ <S%H3588><s%> Indeed לִוְיַ֤ת <S%H3880><s%> For they [shall be] an ornament חֵ֓ן <S%H2580><s%> of grace הֵ֬ם <S%H1992><s%> like לְרֹאשֶׁ֑ךָ <S%H7218><s%> unto thy head וַ֝עֲנָקִ֗ים <S%H6060><s%> and chains לְגַרְגְּרֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H1621><s%> about thy neck
בְּנִ֡י <S%H1121><s%> My son אִם־ <S%H518><s%> if יְפַתּ֥וּךָ <S%H6601><s%> entice חַ֝טָּאִ֗ים <S%H2400><s%> if sinners אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תֹּבֵֽא׃ <S%H14><s%> thee consent

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If יֹאמְרוּ֮ <S%H559><s%> If they say לְכָ֪ה <S%H1980><s%> Come אִ֫תָּ֥נוּ <S%H854><s%> for נֶאֶרְבָ֥ה <S%H693><s%> with us let us lay wait לְדָ֑ם <S%H1818><s%> for blood נִצְפְּנָ֖ה <S%H6845><s%> let us lurk לְנָקִ֣י <S%H5355><s%> privily for the innocent חִנָּֽם׃ <S%H2600><s%> without cause

נִ֭בְלָעֵם <S%H1104><s%> Let us swallow them up כִּשְׁא֣וֹל <S%H7585><s%> as the grave חַיִּ֑ים <S%H2416><s%> alive וּ֝תְמִימִ֗ים <S%H8549><s%> and whole כְּי֣וֹרְדֵי <S%H3381><s%> as those that go down בֽוֹר׃ <S%H953><s%> into the pit

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all ה֣וֹן <S%H1952><s%> substance יָקָ֣ר <S%H3368><s%> all precious נִמְצָ֑א <S%H4672><s%> We shall find נְמַלֵּ֖א <S%H4390><s%> we shall fill בָתֵּ֣ינוּ <S%H1004><s%> our houses שָׁלָֽל׃ <S%H7998><s%> with spoil

גּ֭וֹרָ֣לְךָ <S%H1486><s%> in thy lot תַּפִּ֣יל <S%H5307><s%> Cast בְּתוֹכֵ֑נוּ <S%H8432><s%> among כִּ֥יס <S%H3599><s%> purse אֶ֝חָ֗ד <S%H259><s%> us let us all have one יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> have לְכֻלָּֽנוּ׃ <S%H3605><s%> shall all

בְּנִ֗י <S%H1121><s%> My son אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תֵּלֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> walk בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> not thou in the way אִתָּ֑ם <S%H854><s%> for מְנַ֥ע <S%H4513><s%> with them refrain רַ֝גְלְךָ֗ <S%H7272><s%> thy foot מִנְּתִיבָתָֽם׃ <S%H5410><s%> from their path

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> For רַ֭גְלֵיהֶם <S%H7272><s%> For their feet לָרַ֣ע <S%H7451><s%> to evil יָר֑וּצוּ <S%H7323><s%> run וִֽ֝ימַהֲר֗וּ <S%H4116><s%> and make haste לִשְׁפָּךְ־ <S%H8210><s%> to shed דָּֽם׃ <S%H1818><s%> blood

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Indeed חִ֭נָּם <S%H2600><s%> Surely in vain מְזֹרָ֣ה <S%H2219><s%> is spread הָרָ֑שֶׁת <S%H7568><s%> the net בְּ֝עֵינֵ֗י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> of any בַּ֥עַל <S%H1167><s%> archer כָּנָֽף׃ <S%H3671><s%> bird

וְ֭הֵם <S%H1992><s%> their own לְדָמָ֣ם <S%H1818><s%> for their [own] blood יֶאֱרֹ֑בוּ <S%H693><s%> And they lay wait יִ֝צְפְּנ֗וּ <S%H6845><s%> they lurk privily לְנַפְשֹׁתָֽם׃ <S%H5315><s%> for their [own] lives

כֵּ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> So אָ֭רְחוֹת <S%H734><s%> So [are] the ways כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of everyone בֹּ֣צֵֽעַ <S%H1214><s%> of every one that is greedy בָּ֑צַע <S%H1215><s%> of gain אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נֶ֖פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> the life בְּעָלָ֣יו <S%H1167><s%> of the owners יִקָּֽח׃ <S%H3947><s%> [which] taketh away פ

חָ֭כְמוֹת <S%H2454><s%> Wisdom בַּח֣וּץ <S%H2351><s%> without תָּרֹ֑נָּה <S%H7442><s%> crieth בָּ֝רְחֹב֗וֹת <S%H7339><s%> in the streets תִּתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> she uttereth קוֹלָֽהּ׃ <S%H6963><s%> her voice

בְּרֹ֥אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> in the chief place הֹמִיּ֗וֹת <S%H1993><s%> of concourse תִּ֫קְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> She crieth בְּפִתְחֵ֖י <S%H6607><s%> in the openings שְׁעָרִ֥ים <S%H8179><s%> of the gates בָּעִ֗יר <S%H5892><s%> in the city אֲמָרֶ֥יהָ <S%H561><s%> her words תֹאמֵֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> she uttereth

עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against מָתַ֣י ׀ <S%H4970><s%> How פְּתָיִם֮ <S%H6612><s%> How long ye simple ones תְּֽאֵהֲב֫וּ <S%H157><s%> will ye love פֶ֥תִי <S%H6612><s%> ones וְלֵצִ֗ים <S%H3887><s%> ambassador לָ֭צוֹן <S%H3944><s%> in their scorning חָמְד֣וּ <S%H2530><s%> delight לָהֶ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> like וּ֝כְסִילִ֗ים <S%H3684><s%> and fools יִשְׂנְאוּ־ <S%H8130><s%> hate דָֽעַת׃ <S%H1847><s%> cunning

תָּשׁ֗וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> Turn לְֽת֫וֹכַחְתִּ֥י <S%H8433><s%> you at my reproof הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold אַבִּ֣יעָה <S%H5042><s%> behold I will pour out לָכֶ֣ם רוּחִ֑י <S%H7307><s%> my spirit אוֹדִ֖יעָה <S%H3045><s%> unto you I will make known דְבָרַ֣י <S%H1697><s%> my words אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <S%H853><s%>

יַ֣עַן <S%H3282><s%> Because קָ֭רָאתִי <S%H7121><s%> Because I have called וַתְּמָאֵ֑נוּ <S%H3985><s%> and ye refused נָטִ֥יתִי <S%H5186><s%> I have stretched out יָ֝דִ֗י <S%H3027><s%> my hand וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> and no מַקְשִֽׁיב׃ <S%H7181><s%> and no man regarded

וַתִּפְרְע֥וּ <S%H6544><s%> But ye have set at nought כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֲצָתִ֑י <S%H6098><s%> all my counsel וְ֝תוֹכַחְתִּ֗י <S%H8433><s%> none of my reproof לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> and did not אֲבִיתֶֽם׃ <S%H14><s%> and would

גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> will also אֲ֭נִי <S%H589><s%> I בְּאֵידְכֶ֣ם <S%H343><s%> at your calamity אֶשְׂחָ֑ק <S%H7832><s%> I also will laugh אֶ֝לְעַ֗ג <S%H3932><s%> I will mock בְּבֹ֣א <S%H935><s%> cometh פַחְדְּכֶֽם׃ <S%H6343><s%> when your fear

בְּבֹ֤א <S%H935><s%> cometh [כְשַׁאֲוָה כ] (כְשֹׁואָ֨ה <S%H7584><s%> desolation ק) פַּחְדְּכֶ֗ם <S%H6343><s%> When your fear וְֽ֭אֵידְכֶם <S%H343><s%> and your destruction כְּסוּפָ֣ה <S%H5492><s%> as a whirlwind יֶאֱתֶ֑ה <S%H857><s%> cometh בְּבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> cometh עֲ֝לֵיכֶ֗ם <S%H5921><s%> When צָרָ֥ה <S%H6869><s%> when distress וְצוּקָֽה׃ <S%H6695><s%> and anguish

אָ֣ז <S%H227><s%> Then יִ֭קְרָאֻנְנִי <S%H7121><s%> Then shall they call וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> I will not אֶֽעֱנֶ֑ה <S%H6030><s%> upon me but I will not answer יְ֝שַׁחֲרֻ֗נְנִי <S%H7836><s%> they shall seek me early וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> they will not יִמְצָאֻֽנְנִי׃ <S%H4672><s%> but they shall not find

תַּ֭חַת <S%H8478><s%> Thahash כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for שָׂ֣נְאוּ <S%H8130><s%> For that they hated דָ֑עַת <S%H1847><s%> knowledge וְיִרְאַ֥ת <S%H3374><s%> the fear יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> and did not בָחָֽרוּ׃ <S%H977><s%> and did not choose

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not אָב֥וּ <S%H14><s%> They would לַעֲצָתִ֑י <S%H6098><s%> none of my counsel נָ֝אֲצ֗וּ <S%H5006><s%> they despised כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all תּוֹכַחְתִּֽי׃ <S%H8433><s%> all my reproof

וְֽ֭יֹאכְלוּ <S%H398><s%> Therefore shall they eat מִפְּרִ֣י <S%H6529><s%> of the fruit דַרְכָּ֑ם <S%H1870><s%> of their own way וּֽמִמֹּעֲצֹ֖תֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H4156><s%> with their own devices יִשְׂבָּֽעוּ׃ <S%H7646><s%> and be filled

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> For מְשׁוּבַ֣ת <S%H4878><s%> For the turning away פְּתָיִ֣ם <S%H6612><s%> of the simple תַּֽהַרְגֵ֑ם <S%H2026><s%> shall slay וְשַׁלְוַ֖ת <S%H7962><s%> them and the prosperity כְּסִילִ֣ים <S%H3684><s%> of fools תְּאַבְּדֵֽם׃ <S%H6><s%> shall destroy

וְשֹׁמֵ֣עַֽ <S%H8085><s%> But whoso hearkeneth לִ֭י יִשְׁכָּן־ <S%H7931><s%> unto me shall dwell בֶּ֑טַח <S%H983><s%> safely וְ֝שַׁאֲנַ֗ן <S%H7599><s%> and shall be quiet מִפַּ֥חַד <S%H6343><s%> from fear רָעָֽה׃ <S%H7451><s%> of evil פ
